item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. What Hath Woz Wrought (18 points | discuss)

9. Apple Watch sleep apnea detection gets FDA approval (265 points | 195 comments)

11. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (164 points | 36 comments)
12. S6 – skarnet's small supervision suite (56 points | 16 comments)
13. D&D is Anti-Medieval (229 points | 319 comments)

15. The Subprime AI Crisis (25 points | 27 comments)

25. Rearchitecting Core Services at X (31 points | 5 comments)
26. Speech Dictation Mode for Emacs (118 points | 28 comments)

29. Paraguay Loves Mickey, the Cartoon Mouse. Disney Doesn't (164 points | 109 comments)
30. The Waterfall Model was a straw man argument from the beginning (2015) (133 points | 143 comments)
